formatted_address: Casa Vallejo, Upper Session Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Hill Station

review.text: One of the best restaurant in Baguio in my honest opinion. We had lunch here twice and it never ceases to disappoint. The roasted beef that’s been cooked for 6h didn’t fail to impress. Even their rosemary baked chicken thighs is too flavourful not to miss! We had coffee at their bistro and it’s still good. No wonder they stood the test of time. Figuratively and literally. Cool to still visit within months of January and February where the breeze blows colder.

formatted_address: Leonard Wood Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Grümpy Joe

review.text: Most of the staff were friendly and.accommodating. The food was superb! Table wait was okay for the lunch rush but food wait not as long as expected. :)

formatted_address: #14-16 Otek St, Brgy. Rizal Monument, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Fortune HONGKONG SEAFOOD RESTAURANT

review.text: A HongKong restaurant with wide varieties. Make sure to check their 2 types of menu. One menu is the chef's recommendation and the other is the regular menu. Food is out of this world but I noticed that they included an old and dried skin part of the onion leeks on their steamed fish. Quality control must be practiced all the time since the first impression on this restaurant is for high end customers. Overall, the experience is worth it. I will definitely come back here to impress our guests with their food.

formatted_address: #1 Ignacio Villamor St, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Amare La Cucina

review.text: Fast and great service. Ambiance is cozy, space is perfect for groups and singles. Easy to find its location with ample parking. Staff are super friendly and attentive too. Food is priced reasonably. They do comfort food well. Its always a pleasure to come over and eat at Amare. We ordered salad, pizza and pasta.

formatted_address: 108, Session Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Oh My Gulay

review.text: The ambiance is absolutely a transformation from Session road vibe to a bit of an ethnic surrounding. Plus, the back view of some houses on the Hill. I had this POTATO SALAD alongside with a mango juice. There's a lot going on this salad but i can't keep my eyes wandering around this beautifully designed interior - ethnic and nature feels.

formatted_address: Otek St, Baguio, Benguet
name: Good Taste Café & Restaurant

review.text: An all-time favorite, locals and tourists alike flock to this well known eatery for good food on a budget! Their servings are big, and you'll definitely enjoy your dinner, lunch, or breakfast! They are open 24 hours, so no need to worry what time you need to be there -- just make sure you have an empty stomach!

formatted_address: 72 Legarda Rd, Brgy. Campo Sioco, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Chaya

review.text: A Japanese Restaurant in Baguio. Great food and the service is excellent! The first time we sat at the outside tables and it was so romantic and the next time we sat inside and it was comfortable and again excellent! Our go to sushi here!

formatted_address: No. 88 Unit C, Old Sicat Hotel, Aspiras - Palispis Hwy, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Chef's Home

review.text: Cozy atmosphere, friendly staff and all food items are made by Chef Alvin. Delicious food, extensive menu on Asian Fusion. Food is made from.scratch so dont go there if youre starving.  30 minutes is the average wait on food. They also have rice bowls, so eating on your own shouldn't be a problem.

formatted_address: 38 South Dr, Camp John Hay, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Korean Palace Restaurant

review.text: Great place to eat with friends and family. The owner is nice and she would greet and chat with customers. There were costumes (which need cleaning) for patrons to wear for photo ops. Wide selection of food. downside would be the ride goin back to the city center.

formatted_address: 34 Paterno St., South Drive, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Secret Garden

review.text: Good, tasty dishes at reasonable prices. Good view overlooking South Drive. Plants indeed provide a calming, cool ambience. Accessible via taxi or if you drive. Limited parking slots. Quite challenging to get waitresses' attention. All in all, I will come back. Good find!

formatted_address: 82 Upper, Gen. Luna Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Red Rustikz

review.text: The food is very good. My kids really like it. Fresh made pasta. Nothing beats that. Very nice ambiance, family friendly and good service.

formatted_address: Doña Anita Bldg, 64 Session Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: 456 Restaurant

review.text: Very affordable place to eat and the local’s favorite as well. The place is spacious and clean and serves a lot of delicious Filipino food.  The food sometimes is served cold though so make sure to have it heated. Must try their local “Egado” dish !

formatted_address: 25 Kisad Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Canto Bogchi Joint

review.text: Amazing ribs! Canto is one the best restaurants in Baguio. I really dig the ribs, its super tasty and cheap for its size. I suggest that request to cook it well done and it will even taste better. The salad side dish is also nice perfect match with the ribs.

formatted_address: The Manor, Loakan Rd, Camp John Hay, Baguio, Benguet
name: Le Chef

review.text: Good food and service. The ambiance is also great. Quiet and conducive for get together with family and friends. Not crowded as well.

formatted_address: 16 Loakan Rd, Camp John Hay, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Forest House

review.text: the ambience of this place is cozy, which is really impressive, secondly the food which is also quite good. Staffs are very polite and they encourage you to try new food. You can count this place in ur list if you are in Baguio. I have a friend who had been here several times and on his recommendation we went here and this place really did not let me down.

formatted_address: 1 Ignacio Villamor St, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: ROADHOUSE BARN

review.text: Steaks here are cooked the way you want and are very tender. The flavor is great as well. If steaks aren't your thing, you could also check out their Pork Ribs and Roast Chicken.

formatted_address: Igorot Park, Camp John Hay, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Chocolate de Batirol

review.text: Visit here if you want to have the best breakfast you want to have! The color of the sunlight and the cold temp in the morning makes the experience more wonderful! Great food! They have enough parking space. The price is ok since you have a great ambience

formatted_address: Upper Session Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Mario's

review.text: Great food! Beautiful ambience while being serenaded by a pianist.  You have to try the Mango Flambé. Great looking bar, perfect for  drinks and conversations. A diverse menu of Filipino food,  steaks, pastas. If you want to enjoy the cool weather,  you can eat outside.

formatted_address: 225 Upper Session Rd, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Cafe By The Ruins Dua

review.text: The tea and hot chocolate here are great! I was a bit disappointed with the steak we ordered and their menu is not that diverse. The food was too much for its price. The ambiance of the place was good though.

formatted_address: 4 Ben Palispis Hwy, KM 4, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Baguio Craft Brewery

review.text: Nice ambiance, wide selection of beers to choose from! Staff is accommodating, and can serve sampler sizes of their beer selection to taste. There's good music (live and/or playlist. The experience is overall great. You can even have a lovely view of the city.

formatted_address: 2 Bear'S Trail Corner, Bareng Drive, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
name: Ozark Diner

review.text: Awesome tasting burgers from start to finish keeping your taste buds tingling with flavor little by little until your mouth is empty, and then you take yet another big bite.

formatted_address: Benguet, Baguio, Kiwing na Kahoy Food Kommunity Ili Likha Artist
name: Urban Kamote

review.text: Good food at a good price! Experience the mystical feeling seen in their great interior unique designs! The place was like in the movie the hobbit (because of its hatch) . Lot of rooms (more like secret rooms) that is connected to the other & the other & so on... It's a tree house place, that's why. They even have mini cinema inside! Try to explore! The place was very accessible.

formatted_address: 888-A Ambuklao Rd, La Trinidad, 2601 Benguet
name: Mama's Table

review.text: Great ambiance, that said, the place could use some serious sprucing up already. It looks tired, very twee and stuck in the 90's. There's appetizers for starters then the 8 food courses after is hit or miss.

formatted_address: Lake Dr, Baguio, Benguet
name: Solibao

review.text: Affordable casual dining meals great for sharing and filling your stomach without hurting your budget. The food tastes really good, and satisfying. Cleanliness, customer service, and dining area ambiance can be improved.
